parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To offer, give; I put, place. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to give.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.
One. (including the neuter Hen); a primary numeral; one.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: Another form for kathezomai; to seat down, i.e. Set; intransitively, to sit; figuratively, to settle.
From out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards. A primary preposition denoting origin, from, out.
On the right hand, right hand, right. From dechomai; the right side or hand.
One. (including the neuter Hen); a primary numeral; one.
From out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards. A primary preposition denoting origin, from, out.
On the left hand. Apparently a comparative of the same as ariston; the left hand.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
From the base of dokeo; glory, in a wide application.
